tools.strings-extractor.title: Strings Extractor
tools.strings-extractor.description: Extract readable strings from binary data
tools.strings-extractor.dropFile: Drop file here or click to upload
tools.strings-extractor.aboutDesc: The strings extractor tool can extract readable text strings from binary files or data. It is commonly used in reverse engineering to analyze executables, firmware, or other binary data to discover text information such as URLs, file paths, error messages, etc.
